15.code:
accel_x = None
accel_y = None


while True:
  get_prog_eng().check_end()
  accel_x = get_bot().get_mpu_accel(0)
  accel_y = get_bot().get_mpu_accel(1)
  get_cam().set_text(''.join([str(x) for x in ['accel x:', accel_x, 'accel y:', accel_y]]))
  if accel_x > 0.1:
    get_bot().backward(speed=100, elapse=0.1)
    get_bot().sleep(0.1)
  elif accel_x < -0.1:
    get_bot().forward(speed=100, elapse=0.1)
    get_bot().sleep(0.1)
  elif accel_y > 0.1:
    get_bot().right(speed=100, elapse=0.1)
    get_bot().sleep(0.1)
  elif accel_y < -0.1:
    get_bot().left(speed=100, elapse=0.1)
    get_bot().sleep(0.1)

16.code:
from numbers import Number

gyro_z = None


gyro_z = 0
while True:
  get_prog_eng().check_end()
  gyro_z = (gyro_z if isinstance(gyro_z, Number) else 0) + get_bot().get_mpu_gyro(2) / 10
  get_cam().set_text(gyro_z)
  if gyro_z < 90:
    get_bot().left(speed=100, elapse=0.01)
  else:
    get_bot().stop()
